description: ALTERATIONS AND ERECTION OF FIRST FLOOR REAR EXTENSION TO COMPRISE OFFICE ACCOMMODATION.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed extension would be an undesirable and unneighbourly form of development, detrimental to the amenities of neighbouring residential properties, particularly by reason of loss of daylight and sunlight, visual intrusion and loss of privacy, contrary to Policies P9.29 and P9.30 of the Adopted Borough Plan and Policies E.19 and E.20 of the Unitary Development Plan Pre-Deposit Draft.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development is unsatisfactory in that it does not make provision for car parking within the site, in accordance with the Council's standards, and as a consequence would lead to an increase in kerbside parking in the area to the detriment of highway safety and the amenities of neighbouring residents, contrary to Policies M. 17 and M.19 of the Unitary Development Plan Pre-Deposit Draft.
